pages.title: Hot Stuff
pages.text: With the $(item)Crushing Tub$(), you can also crush $(item)Wildberries$() into $(item)Juice$(). Combining this $(item)Juice$() with $(item)Wheat Seeds$() in a $(item)Cauldron$(), will then allow you to get seeds for the ever hot $(item)Chili$() plant. These seeds are unable to grow unsupported however, and will $(thing)need to be planted on a $(item)Wooden Stake$().

pages.heading: Chili Pepper Seeds
pages.description: Consumes 1 bottle of Wildberry Juice (1/4 of a bucket)
